name: Pitch Detection
description: Detect the pitch of the audio source in realtime.

inputs.name: Audio
inputs.description: The audio stream you want to detect the pitch

outputs.name: Audio
outputs.description: The connected audio stream. Connect it to a speaker to play or connect it to a Detection Output to play with no sound.

outputs.name: Pitch Value
outputs.description: The pitch detection result. The higher the pitch, the greater the number, value range from 45 Hz to 650 Hz. The value -1 represents no pitch has been detected.
